title: Remote Jailor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose another player to jail.
- Execute your target at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot talk with the target, although for them it’ll appear to be a normal Jailor that simply isn’t talking.
- Your target will be unable to communicate in any private chats they may have for the night.
- While jailed, targets are roleblocked through immunities, gain Powerful defense, and all other abilities used against them will fail. Indirect effects may still apply.
- You may only execute thrice. If you execute a member of the Town, you lose all your remaining executions. You may not execute on Night 1.

desc:
Post 2601
*Uh, Grandma? The red circle with the microphone means you’re muted. I can’t hear what you’re saying.*
